title: A Century of fantastic cinema: an interactive history of science fiction and horror films (PC)
brief_description: Join Eddie Munster (Butch Patrick) as he leads you on a fascinating tour of horror and science fiction films, starting from the early silent days and leading into the 1980’s. You can look through the poster gallery and see some great pictures and eerie sound and voice tracks; check out celebrity profiles; see what’s on at the theatre and peruse the souvenirs, all from the comfort of your own home.
